ing: 1 ripe avocado from Mexico, peeled, pitted and diced
1/2 (5.3 ounce) container plain non-fat Greek yogurt
n: Tropical Avocado Fruit Salad with Honey-Lime Dressing
des: "Enjoy the taste of the tropics with this refreshing summertime treat. Perfect for breakfast, lunch or a nutritious mid-day snack. Also delicious with the addition of strawberries for an extra punch of color."
ins:
Combine avocado, mango, pineapple and coconut in medium bowl.
In a small bowl, stir together yogurt, lime juice and zest and honey. Pour over fruit mixture and mix gently. Serve immediately.
